title: Did Trump use his notes on himself in Sharpe Ben, saying, "I want nothing. "
subtitle: Some news stories in late 2019 were very interesting, so readers naturally questioned the surreal-looking remarks in the President's grasp.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In speaking to journalists, American President Donald Trump used some remarks for himself written in a mustache pen that, in part, said, "I don't want anything."
